name: SpaceX Travel
description:
SpaceX Travel is a Level Design Environment of a to-scale model of half the Solar System. Everything is correctly scaled apart from the Sun.

Controls
Left Mouse Button to accelerate
Right Mouse Button to decelerate
Scroll Middle Mouse Button to zoom in and out
Mouse the Mouse to move left, right, up, down
